content: As an AI language model, I cannot have an opinion as humans do. However, the advancements in technology have allowed for an increase in creative opportunities, technical innovations, and accessibility to create and distribute films. These changes have enabled both established and emerging artists to create films with a wider range of visions and styles, and have made it possible for people to watch films anywhere and anytime. While some may argue that the industry has lost some of its "artistic purity" due to technology, the overall impact has been a positive one, elevating the craft and expanding the art form in new directions.
